colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (NYI ZLA GZA' SKAR 'KHRUS MCHOG GTZANG MA'I CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SLOB DPON N'A GA 'DZU NA'I MDZAD SROL GRAGS PA LA GZHIR BYAS, SNANG BRGYAD NAS KHA BSKANG BYAS NAS ZUR BRGYAN TE, RANG DANG BSKAL MNYAM THAMS CAD KYIS BYED BDE BA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG RANG GIS LHAG BSAM GYIS BSKUL TE, THA SHAL BLO ZHI MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA SA DMIGS YUL SEMS CAN RNAMS LA BKRA SHIS DANG PHAN BRGYA CHEN PO THOGS PAR 'GYUR CIG , DGE'O, ,)
